title: Reconnect on a new Panel should stay in the new panel and not go to the default panel
author: kaplandani
body_snippet:

When I use a new panel and the session dies - when doing RECONNECT- the new session is going back to the main screen. 
It should stay on the panel it is cu...

iterations.description: When reconnecting a connection from a non-default panel, the reconnected session jumps back to the default panel instead of staying in the current panel, which is a usability bug in panel assignment logic.

notes:
AI triage: When reconnecting a connection from a non-default panel, the reconnected session jumps back to the default panel instead of staying in the current panel, which is a usability bug in panel assignment logic.
Approach: When reconnecting, preserve the current panel name from the existing connection's panel assignment and pass it through to the new connection setup, instead of falling back to the default panel.
